content: घटा [घट् भावे अङ्] {@--1@} An endeavour, effort, exertion. {@--2@} A number, troop, assemblage; प्रलयघनघटा <ls>K. 111</ls>; कौशिकघटा <ls>U. 2. 29</ls>; <ls n="U.">5. 6</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 19</ls>; मातंगघटा <ls>Śi. 1. 64.</ls> {@--3@} A troop of elephants assembled for martial purposes. {@--4@} An assembly.
